description: Local database identifier of the dataset.
A name given to the record.
A free-text account of the item.
A date of database submission refers to the moment in time in which some information was submitted/received to a database system.
Reference back to any catalogs that contain this dataset.
Indicates the person or authoritative body who brought the item into existence.
The person or authoritative body who provided the information.
A notation regarding the decisions, and/or clarification of any information pertaining to data management.
